about_the_game:
Welcome to Dungeon Rummage - Another Isekai!?

Ever wondered what it would be like when you got reincarnated into a fantasy world?

Now you can find out! Start out as a secluded Gamer shut-in, abandoned by society and work your way to become a legend among the townsfolk as you conquer the dungeon, build up the city and romance various characters!

Careful! Falling in the dungeon has dire consequences!

Acquire materials and crystals by slaying monsters inside the dungeon, wich can later be used for building or traded in for some hard earned cash!

Explore the dungeon with the unique "Rummage System"!


As you venture deeper into the dungeon, new people will come to town. New allies and romance partners that can help on your adventure!

What secrets will you uncover? What lies at the bottom of it all? Who knows! Only one way to find out!

Current features:
Explore the city of Echeia
Build various locations like The mine, logging site, the ranch which give you passive income of resources for building. Dig up a hotspring and relax with your party members & more.
Find, recruit and become friends with many lovely characters such as Tha'z Gar the orc fighter, Nephenee the elven scout or Lyra the mage.
Delve into the dungeon with its unique "Rummage System". Which eliminates the basic turn based combat and focuses on resource management v.s. uncertainty. Represented in a Dungeons & Dragons / Visual Novel style.
Find loot, money, weird goblin brothers and other charming encounters during your exploration.
Enjoy different minigames like cutting weeds for the farm girl or fishing.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features mild nudity in the form of nude sprites & the occasional "spicy" imagery you'd expect from a dating sim type game. All private parts in these scenes will be covered however.

name: Dungeon Rummage - Another Isekai?!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-Board
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or higher
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-Board

short_description: Ever wondered what it would be like to be reincarnated into a fantasy world? Now you can find out! Start out as a secluded Gamer shut-in, and work your way to become a legend among the townsfolk as you conquer the dungeon, build up the city, and romance various characters!
